Desc.entry: Community centre providing community rooms for hire for a variety of groups on a regular basis, as well as one off events (see separate entry). User groups include dance classes, music, playgroups for children and organic cultivation. Facilities include a 4 table snooker hall for use by the community , available Tues and Thurs evenings. A registered charity, Company limited by guarantee no 7268567.

DisabledAccess.entry: access to hall only (steps to elsewhere)

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 6
